intro.description: I translate user concerns into effective solutions

about.title: Hi, I am Alan Casella. Nice to meet you üëãüèª
about.description: 4+ years of experience building end-to-end web applications, optimizing infrastructure and resolved critical production issues in fast-paced environments. Strong focus on performance, maintainability and UX. Bilingual (Spanish/English C2).

ecomerce.title: My first project
ecomerce.name: E-commerce Patagonia
ecomerce.description: App completed in 1 month in a team of 4 students. Deployed on vercel and database on Heroku. Allows users to browse for products, add them to a cart and simulate shopping payment.

henryapp.title: Henry App final project
henryapp.name: Henry manager
henryapp.description: Final app as a student. Allows administrators to manage attendance, courses, students and teachers. Includes authentication and user roles.

listnext.title: ToDo Tasks Manager
listnext.name: Nextjs ToDo List
listnext.description: Deployed on Vercel in 1 week using a cloud database as a technical exercise.

googledb.title: Minimalist Web App
googledb.name: Google Sheet DB
googledb.description: App created with minimal cost and requirements. Uses Google Sheets as a database and supports 2 lengauges. App can be used for internal information or external use.
